description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. Fix the issue where XaeroPlus cannot correctly load SQLite  
2. Adjust compatibility detection for the YSM mod 
3. Adjust the default secondary theme color (dark) to white  
4. Remove transparency when using theme colors for RadioButton to prevent visibility issues in some interfaces  
5. Fix the issue where the FPS display position may shift on some devices  
6. Fix the issue where the video background stops after clicking start

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.修复XaeroPlus无法正确加载sqlite的问题
2.调整对YSM模组的兼容性检测
3.调整默认次要主题色（暗色）为白色
4.去除RadioButton使用主题色时的透明度，防止部分界面内无法看清
5.修复FPS显示位置在部分设备上可能偏移的问题
6.修复视频背景在点击启动后停止的问题
